kubejs.ponder.tag.into_the_abyss.descrip: The dangerous depths that lurk below the surface
kubejs.ponder.tag.getting_started.descri: The first steps to surviving on Vultor
The many creatures that inhabit these alien lands
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_1: Many peculiar creatures can be found on Vultor.
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_2: Most animals are neutral, and will not attack unless they are harmed first.
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_3: Some creatures may retaliate in groups.
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_4: Certain creatures can be domesticated, courtesy of the fraktans.
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_5: Some creatures drop hides that can be turned into leather.
kubejs.ponder.animal_types_scene.text_6: Particularly toothy creatures may drop vicious fangs.
kubejs.ponder.broken_fabricator_scene.te: In order to create more sophisticated equipment, the Fabricator must be repaired.
The first step will involve fixing the outer casing of the Fabricator.
Applying an iron sheet will convert it into a Fabricator Casing.
In order to fully restore the Fabricator, it will need a power source.
Applying an advanced battery will convert it into a Fabricator.
Batteries and iron sheets can be acquired by defeating Robotic enemies such as Rogue Sentries.
kubejs.ponder.colonist_types_scene.text_: The Colonists are the only humans on this world.
They have crash landed here, and are struggling to survive.
Everything seems to want them dead...
As a result, colonists have banded together in defensive settlements, and some have taken up arms.
Robotic assistants have been repurposed for defense, to improve their odds against the resilient fraktans.
Many colonists have gone insane from the prospect of being stuck here. They are known as deserters.
Deserters will not hesitate to attack you and other colonists. Tread carefully.
Aiding settlements in raids will earn you the trust of the colonists and their soldiers
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_1: The Fraktans are the hardy natives which inhabit these lands.
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_2: Their scaly skin and headcases serve as natural armor.
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_3: Their bulky, dense builds make them stronger and faster than humans.
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_4: Fraktans of varying prestige and speciality can be found, but only in specific contexts.
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_5: The most dangerous fraktans will emerge in the midst of raids on colonist settlements.
kubejs.ponder.fraktan_types_scene.text_6: All fraktan entities drop severed horns. Stronger fraktans can drop tempered scales
kubejs.ponder.lower_abyss_portal_scene.t: Using materials from the Upper Abyss, the frame for a gateway to the Lower Abyss can be built.
Light a fire inside of the frame to activate the portal.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_1: Vultor is home to many synthetic lifeforms, most of which are hostile.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_2: The most common robotic lifeforms are Sentries.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_3: Sentries are hostile bipedal automatons. They seem to only attack foreign entities.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_4: Sentries vary in appearance depending on where they are located.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_5: Demolitionists are dangerous, self-destructive machines, closely related to Sentries.
kubejs.ponder.robotic_types_scene.text_6: All robotic entities drop iron components and advanced batteries.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_1: While the multitool is helpful, it is not very effective.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_2: Currently, only improvised and crude tools can be made.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_3: A Fabricator and Wooden/Crude Hammer will be needed in order to create a workbench and make upgrades to these tools.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_4: To make a workbench, right click a Fabricator with a Wooden Hammer.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_5: Basic tools can be modified in the workbench. Some modules will require better hammers, so be sure to upgrade the hammer as well.
kubejs.ponder.tetra_scene.text_6: Information regarding materials and modules can be found in the Holosphere.
kubejs.ponder.upper_abyss_portal_scene.t: In order to descend into each layer of Vultor's depths, anomalous technologies must be used.
Below the bedrock of the caves lies the Upper Abyss.
To reach the Upper Abyss, a frame must be built out of stone or deepslate bricks.
Construct an Upper Abyss Portal Key and right click the frame to open the gateway.
kubejs.ponder.void_portal_scene.text_1: There is an anomalous realm that exists beyond Vultor. It is known as the Void.
kubejs.ponder.void_portal_scene.text_2: It is possible to construct a special void gateway using materials from all layers of Vultor.
kubejs.ponder.void_portal_scene.text_3: To reach the Void, a frame must be built out of special void portal frame parts.
kubejs.ponder.void_portal_scene.text_4: 12 Voideyes must be created and inserted into the recesses of the frame. Doing so will open the gateway.
